organic_results.title: The institutionalization of academic innovations: Two models
organic_results.snippet: Data from a sample of 115 colleges and universities are used to analyze the organizational conditions associated with the institutionalization of new academic programs. The presence of programs in" emerging standard disciplines"--biophysics, linguistics, statistics, computer science, and environmental studies--is related only to conditions indicating the availability of slack resources and to size. The presence of programs in less accepted areas--urban and/or ethnic studies--is related not only to these conditions but also to the presence of internal …
